teachingApproach.title: Teaching Philosophy
content: My teaching approach emphasizes both technical proficiency and musical expression. Students learn not just how to play the notes, but how to make them sing with meaning and emotion.
Each lesson is tailored to the individual student's goals, whether they're interested in classical technique, jazz arrangements, blues expression, or developing their own compositional voice.
I believe in building a strong foundation of proper technique while encouraging creativity and personal musical development.

quotes.quote: Kinloch's teaching has completely transformed my approach to the guitar. His focus on musicality alongside technique has made me a much more complete player.
quotes.author: Sarah M.

quotes.quote: The workshop was incredibly informative and inspiring. I learned techniques I never would have discovered on my own.
